article_title: Aetna-Humana Deal Clears Key Antitrust Hurdle But Divestitures Loom

article_metadata.description: Aetna said it has “secured 10 of the 20 state approvals required” to complete its $37 billion purchase of Humana to form one of the nation's largest health insurance companies, but the U.S. Justice Department may still "require divestitures," the company confirmed. Aetna said its latest state approval came from the state [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
